TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NavigationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供無法取消之巡覽事件的資料，包括 、 和 。

span.span: Provides data for non-cancelable navigation events, including , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: public object Content { get; }
.property instance object Content
Public ReadOnly Property Content As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Content { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目標頁面內容的根節點。

span.span: Gets the root node of the target page's content.

value.span: 目標頁面內容的根項目。

span.span: The root element of the target page's content.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ExtraData { get; }
.property instance object ExtraData
Public ReadOnly Property ExtraData As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ExtraData { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得選擇性、使用者定義的資料物件。

span.span: Gets an optional user-defined data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫巡覽至新頁面時，您可以將使用者自訂資料物件傳遞方法。When you call to navigate to a new page, you have the option of passing the method a user-defined data object. 該物件接著會指派給這個屬性，讓您能輕鬆存取資料，當您處理時事件。That object is then assigned to this property so that you have easy access to the data when you handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsNavigationInitiator { get; }
.property instance bool IsNavigationInitiator
Public ReadOnly Property IsNavigationInitiator As Boolean
public: property bool IsNavigationInitiator { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前巡覽器是否初始化巡覽。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current navigator initiated the navigation.

value.span: 如果巡覽是在目前框架內初始化則為 ，如果也要巡覽父巡覽器則為 。

span.span: if the navigation was initiated inside the current frame; if the parent navigator is also navigating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出是否目前導覽正在初始化巡覽或是否正在巡覽的父巡覽。This property indicates whether the current navigator is initiating the navigation or whether a parent navigator is being navigated. 比方說，目前巡覽器可能會父導覽內巡覽至在網頁內的畫面格。For example, the current navigator might be a frame inside a page that is being navigated to inside a parent navigator. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否要在微調球體`Navigating`事件或停止轉動地球上`LoadCompleted`事件。You can use this property to determine whether to spin the globe on a `Navigating` event or to stop spinning the globe on a `LoadCompleted` event. 如果這個屬性是`false`、 [導覽] 父導覽也瀏覽和球體旋轉。If this property is `false`, the navigator's parent navigator is also navigating and the globe is already spinning. 如果這個屬性是`true`、 瀏覽已起始內目前的框架，而您應該旋轉球體 （或停止旋轉的地球，依據處理事件）。If this property is `true`, the navigation was initiated inside the current frame and you should spin the globe (or stop spinning the globe, depending on which event is being handled.)

MemberSignature.Value: public object Navigator { get; }
.property instance object Navigator
Public ReadOnly Property Navigator As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Navigator { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得引發事件的巡覽器

span.span: Gets the navigator that raised the event
The navigator that raised the event.

summary.span: 取得 Web 回應，以允許存取 HTTP 標頭和其他屬性。

span.span: Gets the Web response to allow access to HTTP headers and other properties.
